scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload
scripts.upload: cd dist && find . -type f -exec curl -T {} ftp://ftp.chimesapp.com/{} --user "STIMSONS@chimesapp.com:Kilburn.12345" --ftp-create-dirs \;
scripts.full-deploy: npm run build && npm run full-sync
scripts.full-sync: cd dist && lftp -c 'set ssl:verify-certificate no; set ftp:list-options -a; open ftp://STIMSONS%40chimesapp.com:Kilburn.12345@ftp.chimesapp.com; lcd .; mirror -R --delete --verbose --parallel=3 . /'
